Specialty Dining Package Wi-Fi Package Premium Beverages Entertainment Shore excursion credits BONUS Resort Fee Waived^ for your Hotel stays, a saving of US$40* + taxes per day! PLUS add comprehensive Travel Insurance and SAVE $500* per booking in-store with Bundle + Save^ Government & Port taxes Gratuities are included in your cruise fare Transfers are additional Itinerary Enjoy a stay in Waikiki, then discover the neighbour islands of Maui, Hawaii and Kauai in style with this NCL cruise. Show more Day 1 Honolulu, Oahu The big, blue Pacific and stunning Koolau mountains serve as a dramatic setting for Hawaii's largest city. Climb to the top of Diamond Head. Take a romantic sunset stroll on Waikiki Beach. Catch a glimpse of history by visiting Pearl Harbor and the National Memorial Cemetery of the Pacific. Check out our amazing Hawaii itinerary. Day 2 Kahului, Maui A surplus of natural splendor and the genuine hospitality of its people have helped to make Maui Hawaii's second most popular island. Explore the fascinating history of the town of Lahaina. Plant yourself on a pristine beach, or play one of the world's most beautiful golf courses. Check out our amazing Hawaii itinerary. Day 3 Kahului, Maui A surplus of natural splendor and the genuine hospitality of its people have helped to make Maui Hawaii's second most popular island. Explore the fascinating history of the town of Lahaina. Plant yourself on a pristine beach, or play one of the world's most beautiful golf courses. Check out our amazing Hawaii itinerary. Day 4 Hilo, Hawaii The entire city of Hilo is like one giant greenhouse with spectacular tropical flowers at every turn. Visit the town's well-preserved historic buildings, which date back to the turn of the century and showcase Hawaii's unique architecture. Just 30 miles away the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park is the home of the active Kilauea Volcano. Check out our amazing Hawaii itinerary. Day 5 Kona, Hawaii Kailua-Kona is a town on the west coast of Hawaii Island (the Big Island). Hulihee Palace is a former royal vacation home dating from 1838. Mokuaikaua Church, from the 1800s, is Hawaii's oldest Christian church. On Kailua Bay, reconstructed thatched houses at Kamakahonu National Historic Landmark mark King Kamehameha I's residence. Colorful coral lies off Kamakahonu Beach. Kailua Pier has boat moorings. Day 6 Nawiliwili, Kauai Named after the Wiliwili trees, which once lined its picturesque harbour, this lovely port of Kaua`i is your gateway to what many believe to be Hawaii's most beautiful island. On "The Garden Island," nature is truly the star, from the dramatic mountains of Kokee to the cool rainforests of Haena. And the tradition of the luau adds lively entertainment unique to Hawaii. Check out our amazing Hawaii itinerary. Day 7 Nawiliwili, Kauai Named after the Wiliwili trees, which once lined its picturesque harbour, this lovely port of Kaua`i is your gateway to what many believe to be Hawaii's most beautiful island. On "The Garden Island," nature is truly the star, from the dramatic mountains of Kokee to the cool rainforests of Haena. And the tradition of the luau adds lively entertainment unique to Hawaii. Check out our amazing Hawaii itinerary. Day 8 Honolulu, Oahu The big, blue Pacific and stunning Koolau mountains serve as a dramatic setting for Hawaii's largest city. Climb to the top of Diamond Head. Take a romantic sunset stroll on Waikiki Beach. Catch a glimpse of history by visiting Pearl Harbor and the National Memorial Cemetery of the Pacific. Check out our amazing Hawaii itinerary. By proceeding, I understand that any personal data I provide will be processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy and I agree to the Flight Centre's Terms of Use Submit Essential Product Information Advertised package deal includes return economy class airfares from Auckland to Honolulu with Air New Zealand, 3 nights accommodation in Waikiki, as stated to be used pre & post cruise, and the featured NCL cruise based on per person twin-share. Transfers are additional. Please note additional pre and or post accommodation may be required dependent on specific flight timings available for your booking. Hotel pricing is dynamic and subject to availability and change. Further terms and conditions may apply. Norwegian Cruise Line: Free at Sea bonus inclusions: Beverage package: Includes a variety of spirits and cocktails, wines by the glass and bottled or draft beer. Includes fountain soft drink, juice, and non-alcoholic beer. Exclusions apply. Further conditions apply. Wi-Fi package: Internet access of 150 minutes is per person & some restrictions apply. Shore Excursion package: Shore excursion credit is US$50 per excursion and is applicable to 1st guest in the stateroom. Credit has no monetary value and is nonrefundable. Excludes embarkation port. Specialty dining package: Includes 1-5 meals at selected specialty dining restaurants on board depending on duration of cruise. Some cruise staterooms are based on a 'guarantee' stateroom. The exact stateroom grade, number and location on the ship will be allocated at the discretion of the cruise line. Some staterooms have obstructed views. Subject to availability & change. Offers are non-transferable, have no monetary value and are valid for new bookings only. Offers are subject to change or withdrawal at any time and combinability with other promotional offers is subject to change. Other restrictions may apply. Gratuities are included in your cruise fare. ^Bundle Plus Save: Book & pay in-store for an international flight + comprehensive travel insurance + add on either a 7-night international cruise or tour to SAVE $500* *T&Cs apply. Minimum spend of $7000 applies. Exclusive to customers subscribed to Flight Centre Deals.. These fees are charged in addition to the advertised price and displayed fares. Merchant fees apply and depend on your chosen payment method. View Booking Terms and Conditions for more information.
